mapper.select: SELECT LA.LECA_NM , B.BLD_SNM , R.ROOM_NO , A.ALT_DT , A.ALT_ST , A.ALT_EN FROM ALLOCATION A, LECTURE L, LEC_APPLY LA, ROOM R, BUILDING B, STU_LEC SL WHERE A.LECA_CD = L.LECA_CD AND LA.LECA_CD = L.LECA_CD AND R.ROOM_CD = A.ROOM_CD AND R.BLD_CD = B.BLD_CD AND SL.LECA_CD = L.LECA_CD AND SL.STU_NO = #{stuNo}
